podcasts.title: The Rob Show #23 - Dave Gunn
podcasts.description: CoFounder of the Tallboyz - Born in Hamden - Pro Rollerblader - Former Hockey Player - Alum of the Rob Show

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #22 - Sam Carlson
podcasts.description: In this episode, Sam Carlson talks about the new construction going on around the Havens and beyond. Also discussing the solar eclipse.

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #21 -  Tony Rick and Andrew August
podcasts.description: In this episode, Tony Rick and Andrew August join the show to discuss their latest projects and insights into their creative processes.

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #20 - Pat Clendenen
podcasts.description: Pat Clendenen, originally from New Haven, returns after 25 years in Boston. A local lawyer and power lifter, Pat is also venturing into skateboarding.

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #19 - Paul Wildy
podcasts.description: Paul Wildy, a 20 plus year cab driver in New Haven, shares his experiences from working on the Carter campaign to witnessing the citys evolution over the decades

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #18 - My Own Grenade
podcasts.description: My own grenade has been around since the 90s. What started as a highschool friendship has led to a lifetime of music.

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #17 - Aidan Bauer
podcasts.description: In episode 17 of The Rob Show, Aidan Bauer, a game designer, programmer, and artist, delves into gaming, climbing, and life in New Haven

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #16 - Joshua Sanders
podcasts.description: The Rob Show is Back with ever festive Joshua Sanders, a former Califorian/Texian who loves Christmas.

podcasts.title: The Rob Show #14 - Ray Meglio
podcasts.description: The Rob Show is Back at with a very special guest - his father - Ray Meglio

podcasts.title: The Alex and Ellen Show #1 - The Squawk of an Eagle
podcasts.description: Welcome to a new podcast, The Alex and Ellen Show, where Alex and Ellen discuss a wide range of topics, from the canals of New Haven to the squawks of bald eagles.

podcasts.title: Found Cassettes - 1
podcasts.description: Old Shin Harmonica - the creation of a lost song
